mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report ( member_no, reporter_no, report_time, report_reason, report_status, report_type, report_board_no ) VALUES ( #{memberNo}, #{reporterNo}, #{reportTime}, #{reportReason}, #{reportStatus}, #{reportType}, #{reportBoardNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT report_no, member_no, reporter_no, report_time, report_reason, report_status, report_type, report_board_no FROM report ORDER BY report_time DESC
SELECT report_no, member_no, reporter_no, report_time, report_reason, report_status, report_type, report_board_no FROM report WHERE report_no = #{reportNo}

SELECT r.report_no AS reportNo, r.report_type AS reportType, r.report_reason AS reportReason, r.report_time AS reportTime, r.report_status AS reportStatus, m.member_no AS memberNo, m.nickname AS memberNickname, b.board_no AS boardNo, b.board_title AS boardTitle, b.board_content AS boardContent, c.comment_no AS commentNo, c.comment_content AS commentContent, TO_CHAR(c.comment_write_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS commentWriteDate FROM report r LEFT JOIN member m ON r.member_no = m.member_no LEFT JOIN board b ON r.report_board_no = b.board_no LEFT JOIN "COMMENT" c ON r.report_type = 1 AND c.board_no = b.board_no AND c.comment_no = r.report_board_no WHERE r.report_no = #{reportNo}
